mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.disname AS "disname", a.cityid AS "cityid", a.dissort AS "dissort", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.longitude AS "longitude"
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.disname AS "name", a.cityid AS "parentId", FALSE AS "parent", "3" AS "type" FROM ots.t_district a WHERE a.cityid=${id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ots.t_district( id, code, disname, cityid, dissort, latitude, longitude ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{disname}, #{cityid}, #{dissort}, #{latitude}, #{longitude} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ots.t_district SET code = #{code}, disname = #{disname}, cityid = #{cityid}, dissort = #{dissort}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude} WHERE id = #{id}
